svg.title: apps
svg.text: import java.util.Arrays;import java.util.function.Function;import java.util.function.Predicate;/** * Utility methods related to creating predicates */public class PredicateUtil { /** * Creates a {@code Predicate} using {@code constructor} with parameters {@code keywords} */ public static Predicate<ReadOnlyPerson> createPredicate( Function<String, ? extends Predicate<ReadOnlyPerson>> constructor, String... keywords) { requireAllNonNull(keywords, constructor); AppUtil.checkArgument(keywords.length > 0); return Arrays.stream(keywords).map(constructor).map(predicate -> (Predicate<ReadOnlyPerson>) predicate) .reduce(Predicate::or).get(); }}
